data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Tomatoes should be harvested before they are fully ripe. It's ____ to ____ them ____ they ____ extremely ____ because ____ will ____ sweeter ____ thinner-skinned. If you wait too long to harvest them, they will not be as tender.
data.partBlankContent: Tomatoes should be harvested before they are fully ripe. It's bet___ to har____ them bef___ they a__ extremely ri__ because th__ will b_ sweeter a__ thinner-skinned. If you wait too long to harvest them, they will not be as tender.
data.answer: 西红柿应该在完全成熟之前就收获。最好在它们非常成熟之前收割，因为它们会更甜，皮更薄。如果你等待太久才收获它们，它们就不会那么嫩了。
